/usr/bin/clang++-3.8    -lsfml-audio -lsfml-system -Wno-c++11-narrowing -std=c++11 -g -Wall   CMakeFiles/PROGRAM.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o PROGRAM  -L/home/elcius/Documentos/github/pessoal/island-life-game/lib -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lGLEW -lSOIL -lassimp -lfreetype -Wl,-rpath,/home/elcius/Documentos/github/pessoal/island-life-game/lib
